metadata.title: CVE-2021-29944 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Lack of escaping allowed HTML injection when a webpage was viewed in ReaderView. While a Content Security Policy prevents direct code execution, HTMLinjection is still possible. *Note: This issue only affected Firefox forAndroid. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 88.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
